pkgmetadata.longdescription: Manipulate Virtual Functions // If f - function(x){x^2} and g - function(x){x+1} it is a constant source of annoyance that "f+g" is not defined. Package 'vfunc' allows you to do this, and we have (f+g)(2) returning 5. The other arithmetic operators are similarly implemented. A wide class of coding bugs is eliminated.
